original_text: And he said, Thou knowest that the kingdom was mine, and that all Israel set their faces on me, that I should reign: howbeit the kingdom is turned about, and is become my brother's: for it was his from the Lord.
korean_text: 그가 이르되 당신도 아시는 바이거니와 이 왕위는 내 것이었고 온 이스라엘은 다 얼굴을 내게로 향하여 왕으로 삼으려 하였는데 그 왕권이 돌아가 내 아우의 것이 되었음은 여호와께로 말미암음이니이다

sentences.original_text: Thou knowest that the kingdom was mine,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그 왕국이 내 것이었음을 알거라와,

sentences.original_text: and that all Israel set their faces on me,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 온 이스라엘이 나에게 얼굴을 향했음을,

sentences.original_text: howbeit the kingdom is turned about,
for it was his from the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그것은 주께로부터 온 것이었기 때문이다.
